messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Marji!!?
messages.msgSnippet: ... Liam s GREAT!!!!  We were just talking bout you guys, ya know!  We just got in from a gig.  I didn t fall *completely* off the face of earth -- but, we ve
messages.messageBody:
At 17:19 2/25/2006, you wrote:
>"Sending love,
>Marji, vigorously waving to and missing everyone!"
>
>Is that YOU Marji Zintz???The Marji I thought fell of the face of the
>earth, whose lovely music I listen to??!!
>
>How is that lovely Liam doing?
>
>Ren
>learninginfreedom.com


Liam's GREAT!!!! We were just talking 'bout you guys, ya know! We
just got in from a gig. I didn't fall *completely* off the face of
earth -- but, we've been keeping our world pretty small. I thought
we'd be able to go to St. Louis last year, but we had some major
setbacks (like losing both old cars at the same time) and stuff like
that, and ... well... life goes on. We're really doin' okay now, and
looking to move a little further north. Liam's yu-gi-oh-ing and
magic-ing and is just a glorious, brilliant person who I can't get enough of!

If we can swing it, we're going to try to come to Peabody in May.

Anywho, I'm finally able to start reading the list again. It's been
*very* refreshing!

Sending lots of love,
Marji


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Marji!!?
messages.msgSnippet: Sending love, Marji, vigorously waving to and missing everyone! Is that YOU Marji Zintz???The Marji I thought fell of the face of the earth, whose lovely
messages.messageBody:
"Sending love,
Marji, vigorously waving to and missing everyone!"

Is that YOU Marji Zintz???The Marji I thought fell of the face of the
earth, whose lovely music I listen to??!!

How is that lovely Liam doing?

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
